s: Yoto is a carefully connected speaker – it has the smarts of a connected device, but all the content is safe, since the Yoto Card Store has been built for kids from the ground up.
A carefully connected screen-free speaker. Made for children, controlled with physical cards and playing only the audio content you want them to listen to. No camera. No microphone. No Ads.
Yoto Player plays audiobook stories, music, activities, sound effects, radio and podcasts for kids.

A carefully connected screen-free speaker. Made for children, controlled with physical cards and playing only the audio content you want them to listen to. Yoto Mini’s size and all-day battery make it perfect to take anywhere; road trips, flights and play dates. No camera. No microphone. No Ads.

November 24, 2024 - A new day for creative play ! Yoto Player (3rd Generation) lets kids lead the way through childhood. Inspire independence, soothe sensitive sleepers and take creative play to new heights with 1,000+ ad-free audio titles.
